channel.title: Error 86-- GFX animations (bandos)
channel.description:
Now I did this tut and everything went great but until I got this error "error 86" which was the 1124 gfx aka bandos gfx and animation, but have no clue how to fix this error...
This guy in this tut [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/183077-release-all-474-skill-capes-gfx-more.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/183077-release-all-474-skill-capes-gfx-more.html[/url] tells me to do something but have no clue what he is saying lol
Can someone please help me fix this error?
Stuff what did *the tuts I did [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/182332-hardcoding-new-emote-system.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/182332-hardcoding-new-emote-system.html[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/182908-extending-emote-list.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/182908-extending-emote-list.html[/url] *added 1124.dat in the "anim" folder *added the animations to bandos in the class5.java *added the gfx in class20.java
What do I need to do? Thanks

item.title: Error 86-- GFX animations (bandos)
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Now I did this tut and everything went great but until I got this error “error 86” which was the 1124 gfx aka bandos gfx and animation, but have no clue how to fix this error…

This guy in this tut http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/183077-release-all-474-skill-capes-gfx-more.html tells me to do something but have no clue what he is saying lol

Can someone please help me fix this error?

Stuff what did
*the tuts I did http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/182332-hardcoding-new-emote-system.html http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/182908-extending-emote-list.html
*added 1124.dat in the “anim” folder
*added the animations to bandos in the class5.java
*added the gfx in class20.java

What do I need to do?
Thanks
